explanation: Use this endpoint to create a new build flashcard

parameters.name: chapter_ids
parameters.description: IDs for selected chapters to build a flashcard

parameters.name: no_of_flashcards
parameters.description: No of flashcard items. The number is limited to following values: 25, 50, 100 or All
